title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about SEGRD

items.question: What is SEGRD?
items.answer: SEGRD is a modular security, forensics, and incident response platform designed for regulated organizations that require evidence integrity, controlled automation, and private AI execution.

items.question: Who is SEGRD designed for?
items.answer: SEGRD is built for small and medium SOCs, law firms and expert witnesses, regional banks, government agencies, MSSPs, and healthcare organizations.

items.question: What is BYO-LLM?
items.answer: BYO-LLM (Bring Your Own LLM) means you can run your own AI model on your infrastructure. Your sensitive data never leaves your network. You can use OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, or local Ollama.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: Your evidence and case data are stored in your own infrastructure. On-premise and air-gapped deployments are available.

items.question: What compliance standards does SEGRD support?
items.answer: SEGRD is designed for HIPAA, SOX, PCI-DSS, GDPR, and SOC 2 Type II requirements with immutable audit logs and complete chain of custody.

items.question: Can I integrate with my existing tools?
items.answer: Yes. SEGRD integrates with your SIEM, EDR, SOAR, and other security tools via REST API and webhooks.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: Fixed per-seat pricing. No surprises from token consumption or data volume. Contact us for a custom quote.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes. 14-day free trial with full access to all modules. No credit card required.
